column1: The title of Meja Mwangi's debut novel, published in 1974, is "Going Down River Road."
The title of Ngugi wa Thiong'o's first novel written in English is "Weep Not, Child."
Notable works written by Okot p'Bitek include "Song of Lawino" (1966) and "Song of Ocol" (1970).
